import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { type:string = "password"; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} hideShowPass() {} }
